member.name: M:ConsoleExtensions.Proxy.ConsoleProxy.HideCursor
member.summary: Hides the cursor.

member.name: M:ConsoleExtensions.Proxy.ConsoleProxy.ReadKey(System.ConsoleKeyInfo@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtains the next character or function key pressed by the user. The pressed key is optionally displayed in the console window.
member.param: An object that describes the constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key. The object also describes, in a bitwise combination of values, whether one or more Shift, Alt, or Ctrl modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key.
Determines whether to display the pressed key in the console window. true to not display the pressed key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ConsoleExtensions.Proxy.ConsoleProxy.ReadLine(System.String@)
member.summary: Reads the next line of characters from the standard input stream.
member.param: The next line of characters from the input stream.
member.exception: There is insufficient memory to allocate a buffer for the returned string.
The number of characters in the next line of characters is greater than .

member.summary: Resets the color.
